title: My Favorite Frame of Helvetica (the film)
content:
For some reason I got excited about [this screenshot](http://web.archive.org/web/20080125221347/http:/picasaweb.google.com/thomas.levine/Helvetica/photo#5135788359603006882) again and can’t contain my excitement.

 [‹ Ampersands](http://web.archive.org/web/20080125221347/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39812 "Go to previous forum topic") [Font problem on Leopard - please help me............! somebody, anybody? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080125221347/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40005 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Thomas Levine

comments.content:
(much laughter)!

Thank you for that.
